title: "Test-Mode"
body:
Hello,
I thought about a "Test-mode" nearly like URF but in free games. So that you can test some plays and combos with flash for example because whenever you try this out in a normal or a bot or even in a free game you need to wait 5min every time :(. Or how often you see Lee sin who can't really give an insec and this guys for example can practise it there. So I'm hoping for the option of a "Test-mode" in free games with 100% CDR so that also lower people can test some combos and nice tricks without getting blamed or having long ammounts of time to wait or just some little modding possibilities (just changing some numbers having unlimited mana and stuff). So pls Riot could you pls insert some kind of a "Test-mode" so dat everyone can practise some plays and combos?? If you cross The third one pls tell me what other features you are thinking about ^^ But if you cross the first one pls push the arrow button next to the title ^^
Im sry for my english im not a native :/
Pls community and Riot pls share this idea thank you.

Your "Project Lee" {{champion:64}} ^^

nennt mich Oldschool... aber gerade, dass man "Den Insect Move" so schwer Trainieren kann, macht ihn doch so... besonders...
